TopicTitle: Kerbals having different hairstyles or facial features

Articles.Content: I know that there are mods that can change your Kerbal's look, but wouldn't it be nice to be a stock addition? Pretty soon people are going to get a bit bored of the same green face with black hair, and the same spacesuit, so why not incorporate a feature where Kerbals have random hair colours or facial features (like TextureReplacer)? I know that it isn't really far up on the list of 'most important', but it would be nice to see Kerbals with different looks for a change. Thoughts on this?
I've been playing this game for 5 years and I'm still not even close sick of kerbal faces, especially when they're plummeting to their inevitable doom.

Having Texture Replacer and Final Frontier really gives Kerbals individuality, and makes them more than just rocket fodder.  I've wanted something like this is stock for so long, but, alas, we probably wont see it until KSP2.  If at all.
Yeah, that would be a good idea! I mostly ignore the Kerbals because they are so boring, sprinkle a little bit of unique in there and you got my head pointed at it again!
That would be a welcome addition for me too.

16 hours ago, RatchetinSpace said:

I've been playing this game for 5 years and I'm still not even close sick of kerbal faces, especially when they're plummeting to their inevitable doom.

This.

 

I know there is support for this, and maybe if a dev in the future gets bored, but I think it should remain in the realm of a mod. 

Historically, this is the way it has been, and I hope forever shall be.  What once was on the devs to do list, kept getting pushed back and back, so it became part of the games lore.  There are whole theories on the origins of the Kerbals that require them to be genetic clones of each other, and other such stuff. 

One of the appeals of the game is that aside from the starting 4, the rest are identical, and therefore, basically expendable.  It would just hurt even more if you are playing a perma-death game, and you happened to get attached to one of your explosion fodder guinea pigs test pilots, and they don't survive a mission.

+1 for this suggestion. I play on permadeath and the suggestion that all my astronauts are clones is ... depressing.
